description:
Whether you’re brushing trails or trimming your backyard fruit trees, this little saw makes short work of small to medium branches. Equipped with Fiskars’ Power Tooth blade, this folding saw bites deeply into wood making efficient, powerful cuts. The dual position locking blade provides adds safety when doing both overhand and underhand cuts. And the ergonomic handle delivers a comfortable grip.

  • Triple ground blade cuts cleanly and deeply with each pull
  • Dual locking blade gives you secure options for both overhand and underhand cuts
  • Button-lock is adds safety and is easy to use with gloves on
  • Light and strong nylon handle has rubber overmolding for a comfortable grip
  • Compact design works well in a trail pack or toolshed
name: Fiskars 10" Folding Saw
